Crop on mex
```{r}
rasta<-raster(filename)

e <- extent(240,289,0,40)
rc <- crop(rasta, e)
plot(rc[[1]])
```

```{r}
r <- brick(filename, varname = "air")
r
cropped.r<- crop(r, e)
```

```{r}
tab <- as.data.frame(r[[200]], xy = TRUE)
tab<- tab %>% filter(x>240 & x<289 & y>0 & y<40)
plot(tab$x,tab$y,col=tab$X1964.08.01)
```
